msbt.message: Hey, ! What's the deal? I thought we were gonna hang at your place!I called to tell you I was coming, but nobody answered. So I came by and knocked, but you weren't even home!Next time we're gonna do this, you'd better be at home and waiting. You do NOT want me mad, !

Oh, ! I know we were gonna hang out at your place, buuuut it's not gonna work out.I know, I know, I promised. I am super MEGA sorry about this!It won't happen again, I swear ! Come bug me later and we'll do this.

My bad, ! I know we were supposed to hang out at your place.It's just that my mom called and we started talking andtime just got away from us, .I was really looking forward to it too! There'll be a next time though. I promise!
